resources.string: Enter something on the top of your wishlist:

Christmas is just around the corner. %2$s I've been very +()+ this year! %3$s I've been working very hard at +()+. %4$s I know everybody has been asking for +()+, but, if I could only pick the one thing I want most of all, %5$s it would have to be a(n) +()+! %6$s Don't forget to +()+ when you get here. %7$s I'll have plenty of +()+ for you and extra treats for the reindeer.
 
Sincerely,
 X %1$s+()+
